title: Successful login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a team member can log in successfully with valid email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to LoginPage
Enter a registered email and correct password
Click the login button
Verify login is successful and user is redirected to AdminDashboard

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails when entering an unregistered email or incorrect password.

steps.description: Navigate to LoginPage
Enter an unregistered email or incorrect password
Click the login button
Verify that login is denied and an error message is displayed

title: New team member registration with valid data
description: Verify that a new team member can register successfully with valid details.

steps.description: Navigate to RegisterPage
Enter valid registration details (email, password, name, etc.)
Submit the registration form
Verify registration succeeds and user is redirected or prompted to login

title: Registration failure with invalid or missing data
description: Verify that registration fails when submitting invalid or incomplete details.

steps.description: Navigate to RegisterPage
Submit the registration form with missing or invalid fields (e.g., invalid email format, short password)
Verify appropriate error messages are shown and registration is not accepted

title: AdminDashboard displays all registered legal processes
description: Verify that the AdminDashboard lists all existing legal processes accurately.

steps.description: Login as admin user
Navigate to AdminDashboard
Verify that the process list accurately displays all registered legal processes

title: AdminDashboard process list search functionality
description: Verify that the search input filters the legal process list correctly by provided keywords.

steps.description: Navigate to AdminDashboard with multiple processes available
Enter process-related keywords into the search input
Verify the process list displays only processes matching the search terms

title: AdminDashboard pagination of legal processes
description: Verify that the pagination controls correctly divide the process list into pages and navigation works.

steps.description: Navigate to AdminDashboard with more processes than fit on one page
Verify processes are split across pages
Use pagination controls to navigate to next and previous pages
Verify processes shown correspond to the correct page

title: UploadForm process upload with valid PDF and video
description: Verify the UploadForm allows uploading a new legal process including a PDF and video attachment successfully.

steps.description: Login as admin user
Navigate to UploadForm
Fill out the form with valid process data
Attach a valid PDF document
Attach a valid video file
Submit the upload form
Verify upload succeeds, a unique client link is generated, and SuccessPage is displayed

title: UploadForm process upload with PDF QR code positioning
description: Verify the user can visually position a QR code on the uploaded PDF in the PdfVisualEditor before finalizing upload.

steps.description: Navigate to UploadForm and upload a PDF
Open PdfVisualEditor with loaded PDF
Drag and position the QR code at a desired location on the PDF
Confirm the QR code position
Verify that QR code position is saved and reflected on the final PDF

title: UploadForm validation for required fields
description: Verify that the UploadForm prevents submission when required fields or attachments are missing.

steps.description: Navigate to UploadForm
Attempt to submit the form with missing required fields or no attachments
Verify form validation errors are shown and submission is blocked

title: Client LandingPage password protection success
description: Verify that a client can access their legal process details by entering the correct password on the LandingPage.

steps.description: Navigate to the unique client link for a process
Enter the correct password
Submit the password form
Verify access is granted and the process video playback and PDF download are visible

title: Client LandingPage password protection failure
description: Verify that access is denied when a client enters an incorrect password on the LandingPage.

steps.description: Navigate to the unique client link for a process
Enter an invalid password
Submit the password form
Verify access is denied and an error message is displayed

title: Client LandingPage displays PDF download link and WhatsApp contact
description: Verify that after successful password authentication, the client can download the PDF and see the WhatsApp contact button.

steps.description: Login successfully on LandingPage with correct password
Verify PDF download button is visible and functional
Verify WhatsApp contact button is visible and clickable

title: Sidebar shows correct navigation items based on user role
description: Verify that the Sidebar displays navigation items appropriate to the logged-in user's role (admin or team member).

steps.description: Login as admin user
Verify Sidebar shows admin-specific menu items including AdminDashboard and settings
Logout and login as regular team member
Verify Sidebar shows restricted menu items excluding admin-only features

title: ConfiguracoesPage whitelabel customization application
description: Verify that changes to whitelabel branding settings update the system UI as expected.

steps.description: Navigate to ConfiguracoesPage
Modify whitelabel branding options (e.g., logos, color scheme)
Save settings
Verify UI updates reflect the new whitelabel branding immediately

title: Dark/Light mode toggle persistence across sessions
description: Verify that the theme mode toggle on ConfiguracoesPage persists user selection via localStorage and applies on page reload.

steps.description: Navigate to ConfiguracoesPage
Toggle between dark and light modes
Verify UI theme updates immediately
Reload the page or open the application in a new tab
Verify the selected theme mode is retained and applied after reload

title: AdminDashboard analytics reports display correctness
description: Verify that analytical reports on the AdminDashboard show accurate and updated data metrics related to legal processes and team activity.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to AdminDashboard
Verify analytical reports metrics correspond correctly to the current system data

title: Unique client link generation upon process upload
description: Verify that each newly uploaded legal process generates a unique and accessible client link.

steps.description: Upload a new legal process with valid data via UploadForm
Verify a unique client link is generated and included in the SuccessPage
Access the unique client link
Verify the client LandingPage loads correctly for that process

title: Access control prevents unauthorized access to admin features
description: Verify that users without admin rights cannot access admin-specific pages such as AdminDashboard or UploadForm.

steps.description: Login as a normal team member
Attempt to navigate directly to AdminDashboard
Verify access is denied or redirected to unauthorized page
Attempt to navigate to UploadForm
Verify access is denied or redirected
